alert.note: Alert for Randolph (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 06 at 1:53AM CST until January 06 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations up to two inches. * WHERE...Portions of southwest Illinois, and portions of east central and southeast Missouri. * WHEN...Until Noon CST today. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous. Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. In Illinois, the latest road conditions can be obtained at www.gettingaroundillinois.com. In Missouri, the latest road conditions can be obtained at traveler.modot.org/map or by calling 1-888-275-6636.
